metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9053 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue, also known as DW201703-005, was discovered in libdwarf2017-03-21. A heap-based buffer over-read in _dwarf_read_loc_expr_op() isdue to a failure to check a pointer for being in bounds (in a few places inthis function).

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
